review.description:
After trying a few chicken and rice carts in the hood, I nailed down the one on Court/Joralemon as my favorite.

Note 1:  He uses basmati rice with cardamom!
Note 2:  His sauce is tangier than most, and it bodes really well for the salad.
Note 3:  His portions are larger than the guys in front of Court/Montague.
Note 4:  He was super friendly and cordial.

The above was enough to make me return a second time, several weeks later (today):

Note 5:  He recognized me!   He waved as I stood in line and I actually turned around to see who he was waving at (it was me)!  We chat and I feel charmed.
Note 6:  He gives me extra food as goodwill.

I will go nowhere else for my lunchtime chicken and rice.
review.author: Andrea L.

name: Court and Joralemon Chicken & Rice Cart

address.streetAddress: NW Corner Of Court Street And Joralemon
